alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 12:56PM CDT until March 16 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... South central Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... North central Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Snyder, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawton, Cache, Snyder, Mountain Park, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Fort Sill, Meers, southern Lake Ellsworth, Lake Lawtonka and Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
